Name: DailyHeartlandsNews/DoGResprite
Body: Multiple Abyss explorers report the Devourer of Gods has reappeared with 'armor like a thousand screaming faces.' One account describes segmented plates shifting to form blasphemous sigils mid-combat. A surviving witness claims the beast spoke: 'The Distortion hungers.' The Godseekers have cordoned off the Abyss, citing 'classified countermeasures.'
